description:
{"blocks":[{"key":"5ufkb","text":"Background:
In vitro models reduce the risk to humans caused by medical research but are
often limited to a single or few cell types. Precision Cut Lung Slices (PCLS), which
model the human lung tissue, contain major cell types in situ allowing the preservation
of intra cell type interactions that occurs during both homeostasis and disease
states. Here we demonstrate a procedure to produce high-quality single-cell RNA
sequencing data from cultured human Precision Cut Lung Slices.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ahmo","text":"Methods: Cryogenically
frozen PCLS slices were thawed and cultured on Transwell membranes. Slices were
put into contact with media, but not submerged. Slices were fed every other day
for 8 days and put into single cell suspension by enzymatic dissociation.
Mechanical separation using cell strainers and density gradient centrifugation
was used to deplete residual agarose. Single cell suspensions were captured and
sequenced.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d582c","text":"Results: Single-cell
suspensions from PCLS slices yielded greater than 80% viable cells. Mechanical
and density gradient centrifugation reduced both the amount and the size of agarose
in the single-cell suspensions. A total of 34,069 cells were captured for
single-cell RNA sequencing, 97.4% of Barcodes were valid, and 97.4% of Reads
were Mapped to Genome. 16 cell types, including all major cell types in the
lung (endothelial, epithelial, mesenchymal, and immune), were identified.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"our6","text":"Conclusion:
The described method produced single-cell suspensions from Precision Cut Lung
Slices that resulted in high-quality single-cell RNA sequencing data of all
major cell types.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3m7qb","text":"Lab coat, gloves and face shield should be worn at all times. All consumables (e.g. tips) should be disinfected in 10% bleach after use. Surfaces should be cleaned prior and after use with Virex followed by 70% ethanol. Experimenter should not open door to hall while working with tissue. No one is allowed into the tissue culture room while the tissue is being actively worked on. All work should be done at a BSL2 level. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3qa09","text":"Combine the following to the top chamber of a bottle-top vacuum filter:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7eitg","text":"  DMEM high glucose (4.5g/L) + L-Glutamine ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ap0r","text":"  Heat-inactivated FBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6qu7b","text":"  of 100x Non-Essential Amino Acids ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ocab","text":"  Sodium Pyruvate 100nM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"pdrq","text":"  1M HEPES Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1t75o","text":"  of 10,000u/mL Penicillin/Streptavidin ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c09c3","text":"  (125ug) Amphotericin B","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":6,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b0arj","text":"  (40ug) Gentamicin","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":7,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eqglr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bv38","text":"Using vacuum, filter media into bottom chamber. Aliquot and store at 4 °C until needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":8,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3a256","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"7.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"5":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"6":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"7":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"800","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"8":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"","guid":"","id":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bmqkm","text":"Prep:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bimjj","text":"Warm water bath containing autoclaved diH2O to 37°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aq1im","text":"Day One:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1n1bv","text":"Obtain vial(s) of PCLS and place vial into warm water bath. Making sure not to submerge the cap and gently swirl vial until only small ice crystals remain. Do not thaw completely. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dnf0u","text":"In biosafety cabinet, decant the vial swiftly over a transwell membrane of a 6-well transwell membrane letting the slice wash out. If the slice does not easily fall out, rinse the vial with PBS, repeat as needed. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vsb5","text":"If necessary, sterile flat head forceps may be used to gently seize the slice and place atop the transwell membrane. Be sure to uncurl the slice so it lies flat.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"31hb1","text":"Gently dispense   of DPBS with Ca2+/Mg2+ onto the slice. Gently swirl plate and then remove DPBS, making sure not the disturb the slice. Repeat.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ahebv","text":"Dispense   of PLCS-TW media into the bottom chamber of the transwell. Media should come into contact with PCLS, but not submerge PCLS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ktdo","text":"Label each well of transwell plate accordingly. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"800","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d67le","text":"To ensure wells do not dry out during incubation, dispense   of PLCS-TW media to any unused wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"800","error":false,"guid":"A9E5A8A9939011EE87AF0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2u3cl","text":"Place plate in incubator at 37°C with 5% CO2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":43,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7rc8a","text":"Day Two: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47rbk","text":"Remove transwell plate from the incubator and move to biosafety cabinet. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"80pvl","text":"Dispense   of fresh PCLS-TW media into the bottom chamber of each well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eiahl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"800","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5sl5r","text":"Prep: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6on8h","text":"- Set incubator to 37°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9jc3n","text":"- Turn on centrifuge and set the temperature to 4°C ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c63q3","text":"- Place the following into the biosafety cabinet:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtrdh","text":"Pasteurs","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8eptb","text":"p1000","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4s0ov","text":"1000uL tips ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rbpl","text":"Tube holder","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3e8sp","text":"Forceps","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60kba","text":"Chlorox spray bottle ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aeqgk","text":"15mL tube holder","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ani","text":"Bleach beaker ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"354cs","text":"Dissociation cocktail ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"da6si","text":"Dissociation Cocktail:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aliqh","text":"1. Digestion Buffer (may be made ahead, store at 4°C):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3},{"style":"italic","offset":3,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8efrb","text":"a) Divalent cation free DPBS (1 L) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1vfh","text":"+ 10mM HEPES-NaOH (pH 7.4) (use 10mL of 1M stock)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"p5v1","text":"+ 150mM NaCl (8.77g)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d42hs","text":"+ 5mM KCl (0.37g)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6h6mp","text":"+ 1mM MgCl2 (0.1g)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbn1i","text":"+ 1.8mM CaCl2 (0.2g)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69s1s","text":"2.  Make dissociation cocktail then add the following enzymes: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4},{"style":"italic","offset":4,"length":59}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65dg0","text":"a) Collagenase Type A from Clostridium; 2mg/ml final (powder) (0.15units/mg and 0.30 units/mL). Stored as lyophilized dry powder at 2-8°C, dry enyzme is stable for 6-12 months. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":3,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkt2o","text":"b) Dispase II; 1mg/ml final (liquid), 1:5 dilution of total digestion cocktail volume (50 units/mL stock, 10 units/mL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":3,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78irk","text":"c) Elastase: Twice crystallized from Porcine Pancreas (0.5mg/mL final) (3 units/mg and 1.5 units/mL). Elastase in unstable at pH 3.5. Elastase product codes: ES and ESL have poor solubility at neutral pH and at concentrations greater than 0.25%. It is suggested that primary solutions be made in KCl or alkaline buffers and diluted into the reaction mixtures or media, compensating for ionic strength of pH changes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":3,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2kabn","text":"3. DNase-Deoxyribonuclease-1 from Bovine pancreas; 2mg/mL final (powder). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3},{"style":"italic","offset":2,"length":72}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fvtmm","text":"a) 10mg/mL solution of DNase 1 in 0.15 M NaCl may lose \u003c10% of its activity when stored for a week in aliquots at -20°C. The remains active for up to five hours at 60°C between pH 5 and 7, and loses activity in \u003c10 minutes at 68°C. Activity of 1 mg/mL solution is lost at the rate of 6%/hour in acetate buffer (pH 5) or tris buffer (pH 7.2)  10 mL of Digestion Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83jle","text":"+   Collagenase type {"blocks":[{"key":"2vdg1","text":"Measure and dispense   of dissociation cocktail into appropriately labeled 5mL culture tubes, one tube per slice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
